ygData.subject: RE: Ok, complaint time!
ygData.msgSnippet: There s your problem, you should have downloaded the small 28 meg upgrade. ... I blamed my SBLive drivers for performance problems for the longest time... but
ygData.messageBody:
There's your problem, you should have downloaded the small 28 meg upgrade.
:-)
I blamed my SBLive drivers for performance problems for the longest time...
but in the end they weren't the cause. A bit surprising since I had some
flaky dev drivers for the longest time last year.

But YMMV. There are a lot of extra bits to the SBLive package, that's for
sure.

One sound side effect I have is that I don't seem to be able to go all the
way to the end on the sound detail slider - I can't get the 3D sounds and
all that. Anyone else had this?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
>
> I recently downloaded a big 28 meg SBLive! upgrade...
